# [Interview #1133: Chicago, Entry #110](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1133#110)

#### Question

In that world are we going to get more of her [Jasnah’s] backstory?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yeah, you’ll get a lot more.
